Uses of Interface
org.apache.freemarker.core.ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration

  • Packages that use ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.
    org.apache.freemarker.spring
    Spring Framework (MVC) Support

    • Uses of ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Subinterfaces of ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TopLevelConfiguration
      Implemented by FreeMarker core classes (not by you) that provide Configuration-level settings.
      Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core that implement ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Configuration
      The main entry point into the FreeMarker API; encapsulates the configuration settings of FreeMarker, also serves as a central template-loading and caching service.
      static class  Configuration.Builder
      Creates a new Configuration, with the setting specified in this object.
      static class  Configuration.ExtendableBuilder<SelfT extends Configuration.ExtendableBuilder<SelfT>>
      Usually you use Configuration.Builder instead of this abstract class, except where you declare the type of a method parameter or field, where the more generic Configuration.ExtendableBuilder should be used.
      class  MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration<SelfT extends MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration<SelfT>> 
      class  TemplateConfiguration
      A partial set of configuration settings used for customizing the Configuration-level settings for individual Template-s (or rather, for a group of templates).
      static class  TemplateConfiguration.Builder 

    • Uses of ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.servlet

      Classes in org.apache.freemarker.servlet that implement ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT extends FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT>>
      Changes some defaults compared to Configuration.ExtendableBuilder, to values that makes more sense for the FreemarkerServlet.

    • Uses of ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration in org.apache.freemarker.spring

      Classes in org.apache.freemarker.spring that implement ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurationFactoryBean
      Configuration factory bean to support Spring Framework applications.
